list.en: You played the flute beautifully.
list.cn: 你的笛子吹得真好。

list.en: Does shopping online have the same steps as shopping in the supermarket?
list.cn: 网上购物和在超市购物的步骤一样吗?

list.en: I play football every weekend.
list.cn: 我每个周末都踢足球。

list.en: Let's play cards instead of doing housework.
list.cn: 我们玩牌吧，不要做家务了。

list.en: Let's meet on sunday evening.
list.cn: 我们星期天晚上见吧。

list.en: How much farther do we?
list.cn: 我们还有多远?

list.en: What are you going to do this weekend?
list.cn: 这个周末你打算做什么?

list.en: What fresh air?
list.cn: 什么新鲜空气?

list.en: Would you like to go to disneyland with me this saturday?
list.cn: 这个星期六你愿意和我一起去迪斯尼乐园吗?

list.en: Did you enjoy the mountaineering trip?
list.cn: 你喜欢这次登山旅行吗?

list.en: Next is a piano solo.
list.cn: 接下来是钢琴独奏。

list.en: I have violin lessons once a week.
list.cn: 我每周上一次小提琴课。

list.en: This mountain is too steep to move a step.
list.cn: 这座山太陡，一步也挪不动。

list.en: Here is a good place for fishing.
list.cn: 这里是钓鱼的好地方。

list.en: The concert will be given on saturday.
list.cn: 音乐会将在星期六举行。

list.en: This mountain is about 5000 meters.
list.cn: 这座山大约有5000米高。

list.en: The concert lasted about three hours.
list.cn: 音乐会持续了大约三个小时。

list.en: Take care as the weather is very changeable on the mountain.
list.cn: 当心，山上的天气变化无常。

list.en: When can we see the red leaves in fragrant hill?
list.cn: 什么时候能看到香山的红叶?

list.en: Can we get anything we need through the Internet?
list.cn: 我们可以通过互联网得到我们需要的任何东西吗?

list.en: I'm going to throw the fish back.
list.cn: 我要把鱼扔回去。

list.en: Do you know where the locker room is?
list.cn: 你知道更衣室在哪里吗?

list.en: The first one to get rid of all the players cards to a discard pile will be the winner.
list.cn: 第一个将所有玩家的卡牌移到弃牌堆的人将成为赢家。

list.en: I'm looking forward to the weekend.
list.cn: 我期待着周末的到来。

list.en: We should have brought more juice.
list.cn: 我们应该多带点果汁来。

list.en: Why don't we go on a picnic by the lake?
list.cn: 我们为什么不去湖边野餐呢?

list.en: My roommates and I have dated to have an outing in this weekend last night.
list.cn: 昨晚我和室友约好周末去郊游。

list.en: I like sleeping late on weekends.
list.cn: 周末我喜欢睡懒觉。

list.en: Do you have to pay a membership fee?
list.cn: 你要交会员费吗?

list.en: How many paths?
list.cn: 有多少条路径?

list.en: There is no fish here.
list.cn: 这里没有鱼。

list.en: We whiled away the whole weekend by playing cards.
list.cn: 我们打牌消磨了整个周末。

list.en: I have a Yoga class tomorrow want to come with me?
list.cn: 我明天有一节瑜伽课，想和我一起去吗?

list.en: I'm going to spend thirty minutes on the exercise bike.
list.cn: 我打算在健身自行车上花30分钟。

list.en: It's a string quartet.
list.cn: 这是一首弦乐四重奏。

list.en: Can we play cards this evening?
list.cn: 今晚我们可以玩牌吗?

list.en: Autumn is just around the corner.
list.cn: 秋天就要到了。

list.en: We are climbing higher and higher.
list.cn: 我们爬得越来越高。

list.en: My hobby is playing frame beat.
list.cn: 我的爱好是打帧。

list.en: I want to learn how to play cards.
list.cn: 我想学打牌。

list.en: I want to go see the red leaves.
list.cn: 我想去看红叶。

list.en: I feel a million bucks after that.
list.cn: 那之后我就感觉爽翻了。

list.en: I enjoy camping.
list.cn: 我喜欢露营。

list.en: Disneyland is in los Angeles suburb.
list.cn: 迪斯尼乐园在洛杉矶郊区。

list.en: Do you want to join our band?
list.cn: 你想加入我们的乐队吗?

list.en: Sometimes I caught a lot of fish.
list.cn: 有时我钓到很多鱼。

list.en: Is it safe to pay online?
list.cn: 网上支付安全吗?

list.en: I've been doing Yoga for a long time. I think Yoga might be suitable for me.
list.cn: 我练瑜伽已经很久了。我想瑜伽可能适合我。

list.en: He always cheats at cards.
list.cn: 他打牌总是作弊。

list.en: Spring is that green returns to the earth to appreciate the blooming spring in the nature or to relieve winter depression mood.
list.cn: 春天是绿色回归大地，欣赏大自然中春暖花开或缓解冬季抑郁情绪。

list.en: Do you like to go to concerts?
list.cn: 你喜欢听音乐会吗?

list.en: Some people think that playing cards is a hollow pleasure.
list.cn: 有些人认为打牌是一种空洞的乐趣。

list.en: We can camp here and hit the road tomorrow morning.
list.cn: 我们可以在这里扎营，明天早上出发。

list.en: Shopping online must be very convenient and fast.
list.cn: 网上购物一定非常方便和快速。

list.en: Guitar is played by plucking at the wires.
list.cn: 吉他是通过拨动琴弦来演奏的。

list.en: What's your opinion of Yoga?
list.cn: 你对瑜伽有什么看法?

list.en: I often fish for hours without catching anything.
list.cn: 我经常一钓几个小时却一无所获。

list.en: Why don't we go in the haunted house?
list.cn: 我们为什么不去鬼屋呢?

list.en: Is it likely that I will come across a hacker when shopping?
list.cn: 我在购物的时候会遇到黑客吗?

list.en: Do you have any engagement on saturday night?
list.cn: 星期六晚上你有约会吗?

list.en: It's too crowded in the gym at weekends.
list.cn: 周末的时候体育馆太挤了。

list.en: Are you ready for a fun day at disneyland?
list.cn: 你准备好去迪斯尼乐园玩一天了吗?

list.en: I was invited for a game of poker.
list.cn: 我被邀请去玩扑克。

list.en: We should take a walking stick.
list.cn: 我们应该带一根手杖。

list.en: The beach is a good place to fish.
list.cn: 海滩是钓鱼的好地方。

list.en: This weekend is the big race of the year.
list.cn: 这个周末是一年中最重要的比赛。

list.en: Please don't litter.
list.cn: 请不要乱扔垃圾。

list.en: It's your call.
list.cn: 你说了算。

list.en: My Yoga lessons begins in ten minutes.
list.cn: 我的瑜伽课十分钟后开始。

list.en: Did you bring some bait?
list.cn: 你带鱼饵了吗?

list.en: You can buy them from online bookstores.
list.cn: 你可以在网上书店买到。

list.en: Our plan of picnic was stopped by the rain.
list.cn: 我们的野餐计划因雨而中断了。

list.en: Fancy a game of cards before dinner?
list.cn: 晚饭前想玩纸牌吗?

list.en: More and more people are taking up fishing.
list.cn: 越来越多的人开始从事捕鱼。

list.en: Do you play any instruments?
list.cn: 你会演奏什么乐器吗?

list.en: The old organ wh.
list.cn: 那架旧风琴。

list.en: Are you a member of the fitness center?
list.cn: 你是健身中心的会员吗?

list.en: It's a scots' love song.
list.cn: 这是一首苏格兰情歌。

list.en: I need to go to the gym more.
list.cn: 我需要多去健身房。

list.en: How do you usually spend your weekends?
list.cn: 你通常是怎么过周末的?

list.en: I always lose at cards with my bad luck.
list.cn: 由于运气不好，我打牌总是输。

list.en: Why don't you go shopping online?
list.cn: 你为什么不在网上购物呢?

list.en: I'm already out of breath, too.
list.cn: 我也上气不接下气了。

list.en: It's time of the maple leaves turning to red.
list.cn: 是枫叶变红的时候了。

list.en: Can you tell me something about disneyland?
list.cn: 你能给我讲讲迪斯尼乐园吗?

list.en: Parents should spend more time to play with their children or go outing with them.
list.cn: 父母应该花更多的时间和他们的孩子一起玩或和他们一起去郊游。

list.en: He never stopped kibetting when we played cards.
list.cn: 我们打牌时他不停地下注。

list.en: Shopping online is an important part of my weekend life.
list.cn: 网上购物是我周末生活的重要组成部分。

list.en: I'm starting to lose weight since I started going to the gym.
list.cn: 自从我开始去健身房，我的体重开始减轻了。

list.en: I'm going to take a trip to disneyland this weekend.
list.cn: 这个周末我打算去迪斯尼乐园玩。

list.en: Yoga is a good discipline for learning to relax.
list.cn: 瑜伽是学习放松的好方法。

list.en: I'm looking forward to the picnic.
list.cn: 我期待着野餐。

list.en: You have a delicate ear for music.
list.cn: 你对音乐有敏锐的鉴赏力。

list.en: Having an outing in spring is the best activities.
list.cn: 在春天郊游是最好的活动。

list.en: He plays the guitar as well as you.
list.cn: 他吉他弹得和你一样好。

list.en: How about going camping this weekend?
list.cn: 这个周末去露营怎么样?

list.en: Yoga requires a lot of concentration.
list.cn: 瑜伽需要高度集中注意力。

list.en: This has been a very pleasant and relaxing excursion.
list.cn: 这是一次非常愉快和放松的旅行。

list.en: We play cards every friday.
list.cn: 我们每周五都打牌。

list.en: I accompanied her on the piano.
list.cn: 我为她弹钢琴伴奏。

list.en: You're very good at playing cards.
list.cn: 你很擅长打牌。

list.en: I'm sweating.
list.cn: 我出汗了。
